content.content: Forum at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Almost 5.5B DAI in circulation. 4.5 more to go till the 10B goal 874×170 29.8 KB   The Surplus Buffer is about to hit 50M DAI for the first time   The Total Value Locked in Maker at $9,3B. 1171×414 30.8 KB      ICYMI - Announcements  In case you may have missed it, @Blimpa just posted the Weekly MIPs Update #44.  Official DAI Bridge on ‘Optimism’ - @Derek alongside with MakerDAO’s Protocol Engineering Team and Optimism have launched the official DAI token bridge on Optimism. Last week, @j0sh started a debate about whether we should start looking into Thorchain network for providing liquidity and the ability to swap DAI. @Growth-Core-Unit has reached out and is already exploring options.    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’   What is a DAO anyway? - @g_dip shares a reflection from his blog on what a DAO is/should be, stirring many reflections on how those thoughts might apply to Maker.  Campaigning: Vote NO on “Inclusion Poll for AmaZix Marketing Core Unit MIP Set - @PaperImperium urges the community to reject the onboarding of the AmaZix Marketing Core Unit and shoots his allegation. @OldPaul from AmaZix replies back.  Prudential Treatment of Cryptoasset Exposures - @SebVentures brings a discussion on how regulators plan to view bank crypto-assets for evaluating safety of their portfolios.  Strategic and Not Naive - @Do_Naam thinks we have to be smart about the usage of donations, grants and liquidity programs or it could backfire the DAO.    Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ No active signals at the moment! If you wish to make a change to one of the Governance Parameters check out our Practical Guide to the Signaling Process to get started.   Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!   Help Wanted  ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Governance Contributors for GovAlpha  - @LongForWisdom puts out the call for new team members! Different tracks available depending on interest and time commitment. Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Forum at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’   Rates Changes, July Core Unit Budgets, and PSM DC-IAM - There’s an ongoing executive vote to decide:  Core Unit budgets distributions (totalling 2,510,503 DAI) Stability Fee decreases The activation of the PSM DC-IAM for USDC    Response to ChainLinkGod Accusations - A viral tweet posted by a member of the Chainlink community suggested MakerDAO is doing filthy business with Oracles. @nikkunkel sets the record straight   Smooth sailing all around. Peg’s looking extremely good!      ICYMI - Announcements   Maker Governance Review: June 2021 - @artem_gordon et al present the Maker Governance Review for June.  Financial report - 2021-06 - @Aes brings us the RWF financial report for June.  GovAlpha Quarterly Review Q2 2021 - @LongForWisdom publishes the GovAlpha Quarterly Review for the second quarter.    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’   Alternative MKR Compensation Guidelines - @LongForWisdom and @Aes propose an alternative, domain-tiered approach to MKR vesting. Update: And thus MIP56 was just born!   MakerDAO Hiring Proposal - @mikkkkk’s opinion on how MakerDAO should handle job compensations sparked off a richly ramified discussion.  Suggestions For Deciding Which Charities To Fund? - @PaperImperium wonders aloud how we should go about deciding which charities to fund and elicits diverse responses from the community.    Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’   [Signal Request] Aave D3M Target Borrow Rate - In preparation for the launch of the Aave Direct Deposit Dai Module, @hexonaut goes through the pros and cons of different possible spreads between the D3M and Maker’s own rates.  [Signal Request] Increase Debt Ceiling of RWA-02 (NS-DROP) from 5M to 20M - New Silver is asking to increase the debt ceiling to 20M from the current 5M, which is close to be reached.    Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro, @charlesstlouis, and @blimpa bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!   Help Wanted  ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Help Wanted: GovAlpha - @GovAlpha-Core-Unit is looking for contributors to work in a variety of flexible roles initially paid on an hourly basis. Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Forum at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activities in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Total DAI supply keeps hitting new highs, now at 5,4B  At the same time, USDC is backing almost 61% of DAI System Surplus is now 49,2MM DAI and steadily rising    ICYMI - Announcements  Second Meet Your Delegate call is scheduled for August 4th. Make sure to join and find out more about future delegates’ platforms. This week, it’s Tim Black’s and PlanetX’s turn. The Risk Core Unit have published an extensive analysis on Maker Vault Activity Metrics with useful insights for risk analysis, business development, and growth.    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Delegate Platforms - Delegate platform forum threads have now been submitted by @monet-supply, Tim Black (@twblack88), Chris Cameron (@PaperImperium), @ElProgreso, and Planet_X. Pre-MIP discussion - RWA Foundations - @SebVentures is looking for feedback on an upcoming MIP regarding RWA’s Foundation Structure. Marketing for MakerDAO - @Kathleen continues with the discussion on MakerDAO’s marketing goals.   Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Adjust UNIV2DAIUSDC-A DC-IAM-line - @ultraschuppi is looking for consensus around raising the Maximum Debt Ceiling (line) parameter for the UNIV2DAIUSDC-A Vault.   Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!   Help Wanted  ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Governance Contributors for GovAlpha  - @LongForWisdom puts out the call for new team members! Different tracks available depending on interest and time commitment. Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase

Forum at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Surplus Buffer went down to 48M DAI due to Core Unit Budget Distributions last weekend after hitting 50M for the very first time.   Total Value Locked went down a bit too (but not too much) to almost 9.2B.  1159×410 30.3 KB   Pegs looking stable since last week.      ICYMI - Announcements  Tim (@twblack88) posted a couple of interesting articles in this week’s Relay you may have missed: — Stablecoins facilitated an astonishing $1.7T in transaction volume in Q2: Messari - Explores the growth of stablecoins and notes that decentralized stablecoins like Dai have maintained a consistent upward trajectory. — Stablecoins Swelled by $13B in 30 Days, Captured 67% of Today’s Crypto Trade Volume.  @LongForWisdom brings us two posts about Delegations, in which details the purpose, types and requirements to be a Delegate: — Delegation and MakerDAO — Recognised Delegate Requirements   Guide to the Signaling Process - @AstronautThis posted a very helpful guide on how to participate in the signaling process at MakerDAO by starting a signal request.    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’   Dai on Different Chains #2 - @alec delves more about the wallets holding Dai on non-EVM chains.  I will vote NO on the ratification poll for Strategic Marcomms Core Unit - @Planet_X has expressed his opinions against the Ratification Poll for Strategic Marcomms CU, prompting various responses from several members of the pointed team.  “Taming Wildcat Stablecoins” Paper – MakerDAO vs Centralized Stablecoins - @PaperImperium brings his thoughts on the recent paper released by the Federal Reserve (with the National Bureau of Economic Research) about regulating stablecoin issuers as banks.  Amazix, the Marketing firm with the worst track record in the ICO era - In the final stretch of the voting for the onboarding of the AmaZix Core Unit in the executives, an anonymous post re-ignites debate, as some community members believe this might not be the best approach as to how we discuss this kind of matters.    Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’   [Signal Request] Adjust UNIV2DAIUSDC-A DC-IAM-line - @ultraschuppi is signaling to raise the debt ceiling for UNIV2DAIUSDC-A. Go vote!    Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!
